com.indra.iquality.dao

Interface FlowDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlowDAOJDBCTemplateImpl

    public interface FlowDAO
    The Interface to interact with the persistent representations of ETL flow definitions.
    Version:
    0.5, 10-dic-2015 The Interface FlowDAO.
    Author:
    Ignacio N. Lucero Ascencio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Flow> getAll(java.lang.String system, int software)
      Gets all the records of ETL flows stored in the underlying DB for the current version of the system.
      boolean save(Flow flow, java.lang.String system, int software)
      Insert a new flow into the underlying DB for the current version of the system.

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        java.util.List<Flow> getAll(java.lang.String system,
                            int software)
        Gets all the records of ETL flows stored in the underlying DB for the current version of the system.
        Parameters:
        system - the system
        software - the software version
        Returns:
        all the flows

      • save

        boolean save(Flow flow,
             java.lang.String system,
             int software)
        Insert a new flow into the underlying DB for the current version of the system. Idempotent method.
        Parameters:
        flow - the flow to insert
        system - the system
        software - the software version
        Returns:
        true, if successful
